refactorings_applied: Removed trailing extra blank lines in src/lib/env.ts (code style consistency)
Updated CLAUDE.md Issue #76 section to remove stale AUTH_TOKEN references (7 env vars, not 8; removed client-side AUTH_TOKEN fallback and masking pattern lines)
Cleaned up .env file to remove stale MCBD_AUTH_TOKEN and NEXT_PUBLIC_MCBD_AUTH_TOKEN commented references, replaced with security-guide.md reference

analysis_summary.dead_code_or_unused_imports: No dead code or unused imports found in src/ related to AUTH_TOKEN removal. All AUTH_TOKEN references were properly removed from source files.
analysis_summary.consistent_code_style: Fixed trailing blank lines in src/lib/env.ts. All other target files have consistent formatting.
analysis_summary.orphaned_type_definitions: No orphaned type definitions. EnvConfig, Env interface, and ENV_MAPPING no longer contain AUTH_TOKEN fields. CLI types/index.ts is clean.
analysis_summary.todo_fixme_comments: No TODO/FIXME comments related to AUTH_TOKEN found in source code.
analysis_summary.stale_documentation: Updated CLAUDE.md Issue #76 section (stale AUTH_TOKEN references). Cleaned .env file (stale commented-out AUTH_TOKEN lines).
analysis_summary.logger_security_patterns: SENSITIVE_PATTERNS and SENSITIVE_KEY_PATTERN in logger.ts remain valid for general security sanitization (Bearer tokens, generic auth patterns). These are not specific to CM_AUTH_TOKEN.
analysis_summary.security_logger_mask: maskSensitiveData() in security-logger.ts remains valid for general token masking in security logs.
analysis_summary.pre_existing_test_failure: claude-session.test.ts has pre-existing failures due to tmux dependency. Unrelated to Issue #179 changes.

message: Refactoring complete. Cleaned up stale AUTH_TOKEN references in documentation and configuration files. Source code (src/) was already clean with no dead code or orphaned types. Static analysis passes with zero errors.
